head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate of Expenditure during the Quarter ending ¶ 30th June ¶ 187 ¶ ...

div.p: J76/5547, unit 877, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Form completed by G. Luehmann and signed by M.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate of Expenditure during the Quarter ending 30th June 1876.
In M to J. MacPherson, 9 May 1876, M had requested that the transfer be made to this budget heading.

cell.p:
Total — Fifty pounds
shillings and
pence .
